catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 308
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: eight figures within landscape; one figure is at shore watching a turtle swim on a leash; others are talking and playing go in background; colorful trees; towering rock formations in background
inscription: ULQ: [What\'s there in the mountains? / Plenty of white clouds over the peaks]
medium: Ink and light color on silk
title: Eight Daoist Immortals
